ROOT.QUERY:
/***********************************************************************/ /* Query : Look for expired SSCC by depot */ /***********************************************************************/
SELECT ul_donord "Whs #", ul_cproin ||''/'' || to_number(ul_ilogis) || '' '' || AR_LIBPRO "Item/LV code desc.", UE_USSCC "SSCC #", UE_ADRUMS "Address", to_char(to_date(UT_VALIND,''RRRRMMDD''),''MM/DD/RRRR'') "UBD", SUM(ul_nqteup) "Inventory (Case)", ar_dlc "Shelf life (#days)", round(ar_dlctd*ar_dlc/100) "Nb days Whs", round(ar_dlctp*ar_dlc/100) "Nb days Store", to_date(UT_VALIND,''RRRRMMDD'')-round(ar_dlctp*ar_dlc/100) - trunc(sysdate) || '' days left in distribution center'' "Comment" FROM TB_EUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_LCUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_TRAUMS@HEINENS_STK_PROD, TB_ART@HEINENS_STK_PROD WHERE UT_VALIND IS NOT NULL -- Param3: Number of days left and 0 >= to_date(UT_VALIND,''RRRRMMDD'')-round(ar_dlctp*ar_dlc/100) - trunc(sysdate) AND UL_USSCC = UE_USSCC AND UE_INDFIC = ''1'' AND UL_USSCC = UT_USSCC AND UL_CSSCC = UT_CSSCC AND UT_TYPIND=''DLC'' AND UL_CPROIN || UL_ILOGIS || UL_ARPROM = AR_CPROIN || AR_ILOGIS || AR_ARPROM AND ul_nqtuvc > 0 AND ul_donord =93080 AND UL_NUMLIG = UT_NUMLIG GROUP BY ul_donord, UT_VALIND, ul_cproin, ul_ilogis, ul_arprom, UE_USSCC, UE_ADRUMS, AR_LIBPRO, AR_DLC, AR_DLCTP, AR_DLCTD ORDER BY ut_valind, ul_donord ASC
